Zvezda dobija klupsku televiziju
Zvezda TV će sa radom početi u utorak 5. novembra tačno u podne

01 Nov 2019

Fudbalski klub Crvena zvezda obradovao je svoje navijače saopštenjem da pokreće klupsku televiziju.
Zvezda TV će sa radom početi u utorak 5. novembra tačno u podne.
Crveno-beli su u obraćanju javnosti, "prošaravši" pasuse saopštenja uvodnim stihovima navijačkih pesama, naveli da "nekadašnji san više to nije", jer kreću "pokretne slike naše velike i srećne crveno-bele porodice".



"Iz albuma naše prošlosti vadimo istoriju, uramljujemo kadrove naše sadašnjost i gledamo kroz objektiv naše budućnosti. I svuda samo naše: kratki i dugi metri naših puteva iz prošlog veka i naših kilometara prema večnosti. Klik na televizoru, računaru, tabletu, telefonu - i eto je pred našim očima. Slika naše fudbalske igre i zvuk naše navijačke pesme. Stalno titra pred našim očima i odzvanja u našim ušima. Dnevna televizijska doza naše Crvene zvezde: život kluba iz dana u dan, klinci kluba iz sata u sat, junaci kluba iz minuta u minut… Jer, nama je važan svaki sekund života sa našim klubom, sa našom Crvenom zvezdom", navodi se, između ostalog, u saopštenju crveno-belih.
Klupsku televiziju aktuelnog šampiona Srbije, a nekadašnjeg vladara Evrope i sveta, moći će da gledaju svi njegovi navijači širom planete. Oni koji žive u Srbiji, moći će da prate Zvezda TV na Telekomovoj kablovskoj platofrmi, ali i putem interneta, o čemu će crveno-beli objaviti detaljno uputstvo u danima koji su pred nama.

The star gets club television
The TV star will start work on Tuesday, November 5 at exactly noon

01 Nov 2019

The Red Star Football Club cheered on its fans with the announcement that it is launching club television.
The TV star will start work on Tuesday, November 5 at exactly noon.
The Red and Whites, in their address to the public, "pasting" the passages of the announcement with introductory verses of fan songs, stated that "the former dream is no longer" because they are moving "moving pictures of our large and happy red and white family".



"From the albums of our past, we extract history, framing our present, and looking through the lens of our future. And just ours everywhere: the short and long meters of our roads from the last century and our miles toward eternity. Click on TV, computer, tablet, phone - and here it is before our eyes Picture of our football game and the sound of our cheer song constantly flickering before our eyes and echoing in our ears Daily TV dose of our Red Star: club life day by day, club kids hour by hour, club heroes minute by minute ... Because, every second of our life with our club, with our Red Star, is important to us, "the statement said, in red and white.
The club television of the current champion of Serbia, former ruler of Europe and the world, will be able to watch all his fans across the globe. Those living in Serbia will be able to follow Zvezda TV on Telekom's cable platform, as well as on the Internet, which the red and white will publish a detailed guide for in the days ahead.
